verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> shir A Song מִזְמ֗וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor, [or] Psalm לִבְנֵ֫י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei for the sons קֹ֥רַח <S%H7141><s%> Ko-rach of Korah לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-ach to the chief Musician עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon מָחֲלַ֣ת <S%H4257><s%> ma-cha-Lat upon Mahalath לְעַנּ֑וֹת <S%H6031><s%> le-'an-Not; Leannoth מַ֝שְׂכִּ֗יל <S%H4905><s%> mas-Kil, Maschil לְהֵימָ֥ן <S%H1968><s%> le-hei-Man of Heman הָאֶזְרָחִֽי׃ <S%H250><s%> ha-'ez-ra-Chi. the Ezrahite יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God יְשׁוּעָתִ֑י <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'a-Ti; of my salvation יוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> yom- day צָעַ֖קְתִּי <S%H6817><s%> tza-'Ak-ti I have cried בַלַּ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> val-Lay-lah [and] night נֶגְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5048><s%> neg-De-cha. before

תָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo come לְ֭פָנֶיךָ <S%H6440><s%> Le-fa-nei-cha before תְּפִלָּתִ֑י <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-la-Ti; Let my prayer הַטֵּֽה־ <S%H5186><s%> hat-teh- thee incline אָ֝זְנְךָ֗ <S%H241><s%> 'a-ze-ne-cha, thine ear לְרִנָּתִֽי׃ <S%H7440><s%> le-rin-na-Ti. unto my cry

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for שָֽׂבְעָ֣ה <S%H7646><s%> sa-ve-'Ah is full בְרָע֣וֹת <S%H7451><s%> ve-ra-'ot of troubles נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; For my soul וְחַיַּ֗י <S%H2416><s%> ve-chai-Yai, and my life לִשְׁא֥וֹל <S%H7585><s%> lish-'ol unto the grave הִגִּֽיעוּ׃ <S%H5060><s%> hig-Gi-'u. draweth nigh

נֶ֭חְשַׁבְתִּי <S%H2803><s%> Nech-shav-ti I am counted עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- among י֣וֹרְדֵי <S%H3381><s%> Yor-dei with them that go down ב֑וֹר <S%H953><s%> Vor; into the pit הָ֝יִ֗יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ti, have כְּגֶ֣בֶר <S%H1397><s%> ke-Ge-ver I am as a man אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- without אֱיָֽל׃ <S%H353><s%> 'e-Yal. [that hath] no strength

בַּמֵּתִ֗ים <S%H4191><s%> bam-me-Tim, among the dead חָ֫פְשִׁ֥י <S%H2670><s%> cha-fe-Shi Free כְּמ֤וֹ <S%H3644><s%> ke-Mo Like חֲלָלִ֨ים׀ <S%H2491><s%> cha-la-Lim like the slain שֹׁ֥כְבֵי <S%H7901><s%> Sho-che-vei that lie קֶ֗בֶר <S%H6913><s%> Ke-ver, in the grave אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Whom לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo no זְכַרְתָּ֣ם <S%H2142><s%> ze-char-Tam whom thou rememberest ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od; more וְ֝הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem-mah, from מִיָּדְךָ֥ <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-de-Cha from thy hand נִגְזָֽרוּ׃ <S%H1504><s%> nig-Za-ru. no more and they are cut off

שַׁ֭תַּנִי <S%H7896><s%> ta-ni Thou hast laid בְּב֣וֹר <S%H953><s%> be-Vor pit תַּחְתִּיּ֑וֹת <S%H8482><s%> tach-ti-Yot; me in the lowest בְּ֝מַחֲשַׁכִּ֗ים <S%H4285><s%> be-ma-cha-shak-Kim, in darkness בִּמְצֹלֽוֹת׃ <S%H4688><s%> bim-tzo-Lot. in the deeps

עָ֭לַי <S%H5921><s%> 'A-lai and סָמְכָ֣ה <S%H5564><s%> sa-me-Chah lieth hard חֲמָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H2534><s%> cha-ma-Te-cha; Thy wrath וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all מִ֝שְׁבָּרֶ֗יךָ <S%H4867><s%> mish-ba-Rei-cha, [me] with all thy waves עִנִּ֥יתָ <S%H6031><s%> 'in-Ni-ta upon me and thou hast afflicted סֶּֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

הִרְחַ֥קְתָּ <S%H7368><s%> hir-Chak-ta far מְיֻדָּעַ֗י <S%H3045><s%> me-yud-da-'Ai, mine acquaintance מִ֫מֶּ֥נִּי <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni at שַׁתַּ֣נִי <S%H7896><s%> shat-Ta-ni from me thou hast made תוֹעֵב֣וֹת <S%H8441><s%> to-'e-Vot me an abomination לָ֑מוֹ la-mo; כָּ֝לֻ֗א <S%H3607><s%> ka-Lu, unto them [I am] shut up וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and cannot אֵצֵֽא׃ <S%H3318><s%> 'e-Tze. and I cannot come forth

עֵינִ֥י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Ni Mine eye דָאֲבָ֗ה <S%H1669><s%> da-'a-Vah, mourneth מִנִּ֫י <S%H4480><s%> min-Ni because עֹ֥נִי <S%H6040><s%> 'O-ni by reason of affliction קְרָאתִ֣יךָ <S%H7121><s%> ke-ra-Ti-cha I have called יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol every י֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom; daily שִׁטַּ֖חְתִּי <S%H7849><s%> shit-Tach-ti upon thee I have stretched out אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha out כַפָּֽי׃ <S%H3709><s%> chap-Pai. my hands

הֲלַמֵּתִ֥ים <S%H4191><s%> ha-lam-me-Tim to the dead תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-seh- Wilt thou shew פֶּ֑לֶא <S%H6382><s%> Pe-le; wonders אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo רְ֝פָאִ֗ים <S%H7496><s%> re-fa-'Im, ;shall the dead יָק֤וּמוּ׀ <S%H6965><s%> ya-Ku-mu arise יוֹד֬וּךָ <S%H3034><s%> yo-Du-cha [and] praise סֶּֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. thee;Selah

הַיְסֻפַּ֣ר <S%H5608><s%> hay-sup-Par be declared בַּקֶּ֣בֶר <S%H6913><s%> bak-Ke-ver the grave חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> chas-De-cha; Shall thy lovingkindness אֱ֝מֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <S%H530><s%> 'e-mu-na-te-cha, your faithfulness בָּאֲבַדּֽוֹן׃ <S%H11><s%> ba-'a-vad-Don. destruction

הֲיִוָּדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> ha-yiv-va-Da' be known בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> ba-Cho-shech dark פִּלְאֶ֑ךָ <S%H6382><s%> pil-'E-cha; Shall thy wonders וְ֝צִדְקָתְךָ֗ <S%H6666><s%> ve-tzid-ka-te-cha, justice בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land נְשִׁיָּֽה׃ <S%H5388><s%> ne-shi-Yah. forgetfulness

וַאֲנִ֤י׀ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha about יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD שִׁוַּ֑עְתִּי <S%H7768><s%> shiv-Va'-ti; But unto thee have I cried וּ֝בַבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> u-vab-Bo-ker, and in the morning תְּֽפִלָּתִ֥י <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-la-Ti shall my prayer תְקַדְּמֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H6923><s%> te-kad-de-Me-ka. prevent

לָמָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> la-Mah why יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD תִּזְנַ֣ח <S%H2186><s%> tiz-Nach why castest thou off נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; any תַּסְתִּ֖יר <S%H5641><s%> tas-Tir be absent פָּנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha thou thy face מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni. at

עָ֘נִ֤י <S%H6041><s%> 'a-Ni I [am] afflicted אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I וְגֹוֵ֣עַ <S%H1478><s%> ve-goyE-a' and ready to die מִנֹּ֑עַר <S%H5290><s%> min-No-'ar; from [my] youth נָשָׂ֖אתִי <S%H5375><s%> na-Sa-ti up [while] I suffer אֵמֶ֣יךָ <S%H367><s%> 'e-Mei-cha thy terrors אָפֽוּנָה׃ <S%H6323><s%> 'a-Fu-nah. I am distracted

עָ֭לַי <S%H5921><s%> 'A-lai over עָבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> 'a-ve-Ru goeth over חֲרוֹנֶ֑יךָ <S%H2740><s%> cha-ro-Nei-cha; Thy fierce wrath בִּ֝עוּתֶ֗יךָ <S%H1161><s%> bi-'u-Tei-cha, me thy terrors צִמְּתוּתֻֽנִי׃ <S%H6789><s%> tzim-me-tu-Tu-ni. have cut me off

סַבּ֣וּנִי <S%H5437><s%> sab-Bu-ni They came round about כַ֭מַּיִם <S%H4325><s%> Cham-ma-yim like water כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom; me daily הִקִּ֖יפוּ <S%H5362><s%> hik-Ki-fu they compassed עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai and יָֽחַד׃ <S%H3162><s%> Ya-chad. me about together

הִרְחַ֣קְתָּ <S%H7368><s%> hir-Chak-ta hast thou put far מִ֭מֶּנִּי <S%H4480><s%> Mi-men-ni at אֹהֵ֣ב <S%H157><s%> 'o-Hev Lover וָרֵ֑עַ <S%H7453><s%> va-Re-a'; and friend מְֽיֻדָּעַ֥י <S%H3045><s%> me-yud-da-'Ai from me [and] mine acquaintance מַחְשָֽׁךְ׃ <S%H4285><s%> mach-Shach. into darkness
